title: An Unusual Clause
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if the Dodgers should trade for Juan Soto or are they already good enough, their thoughts on Kyler Murray’s film study clause and Theo Epstein joins for 5 good minutes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
